AT.name: 3D Classics Kid Icarus™
AT.description: Genieße mit der 3D Classics-Serie Spiele-Klassiker in einer neuen Dimension. Neu aufgelegt mit beeindruckendem 3D-Effekt! Kid Icarus™ ist ein actionreiches Jump'N'Run von den Metroid™-Machern. Der Hauptcharakter, Engelskrieger Pit, muss die Göttin Palutena und das Land der Engel vor der durch und durch bösen Medusa retten. Mit seinem zuverlässigen Bogen bewaffnet muss sich Pit einen Weg von der Unterwelt zum Himmel freikämpfen, um die Drei Heiligen Artefakte ausfindig zu machen. Nur diese verleihen ihm die Stärke, es mit Medusa aufzunehmen. Lass dir Pits Rückkehr in Kid Icarus™: Uprising für Nintendo 3DS nicht entgehen!

AU.name: 3D Classics Kid Icarus™
AU.description: Enjoy classic games in a new dimension with the 3D Classics range, remastered with immersive 3D visuals! Kid Icarus™ is an action-platformer from the creators of Metroid™; starring angelic warrior Pit, who must rescue the goddess Palutena and save Angel Land from the evil Medusa. Armed with his trusty bow and arrow, Pit must battle from the underworld to the sky, to seek out the Three Sacred Treasures. Only then will Pit have the power to take on Medusa. Look out for Pit's return in Kid Icarus™: Uprising for Nintendo 3DS!

BG.name: 3D Classics Kid Icarus™
BG.description: Enjoy classic games in a new dimension with the 3D Classics range, remastered with immersive 3D visuals! Kid Icarus™ is an action-platformer from the creators of Metroid™; starring angelic warrior Pit, who must rescue the goddess Palutena and save Angel Land from the evil Medusa. Armed with his trusty bow and arrow, Pit must battle from the underworld to the sky, to seek out the Three Sacred Treasures. Only then will Pit have the power to take on Medusa. Look out for Pit's return in Kid Icarus™: Uprising for Nintendo 3DS!

BE.name: 3D Classics Kid Icarus™
BE.description: Avec la collection 3D Classics, des classiques du jeu vidéo gagnent une nouvelle dimension avec des graphismes superbement adaptés en 3D ! Kid Icarus™ est un jeu d'action et de plate-forme conçu par les créateurs de Metroid™. Vous y incarnez l'ange Pit, parti délivrer la déesse Palutena et la Terre des anges des griffes de Medusa ! Armé d'un arc et de flèches, livrez une bataille sans merci des profondeurs souterraines au firmament céleste, et trouvez les Trois Trésors Sacrés qui vous permettront peut-être de vaincre Medusa... Et pour encore plus d'action, ne manquez pas le grand retour de Pit dans Kid Icarus™: Uprising sur Nintendo 3DS !

ES.name: 3D Classics Kid Icarus™
ES.description: ¡Revive los juegos de ayer con 3D Classics, una colección de juegos clásicos mejorados con impresionantes efectos en 3D! Kid Icarus™ es un juego de acción y plataformas realizado por los creadores de Metroid™. En él acompañarás a Pit, un ángel guerrero que deberá rescatar a la diosa Palutena para librar Tierra Angélica de la malvada Medusa. Armado con un arco y un carcaj de flechas, Pit deberá abrirse camino desde el Inframundo hasta el Paraíso para encontrar los Tres Tesoros Sagrados y así obtener el poder necesario para enfrentarse a Medusa. ¡No te pierdas el regreso de Pit en Kid Icarus™: Uprising para tu consola Nintendo 3DS!

IT.name: 3D Classics Kid Icarus™
IT.description: Rivivi i grandi classici in una nuova dimensione tridimensionale ed immergiti nelle coinvolgenti grafiche dei 3D Classics! Kid Icarus™ è un gioco d'azione ideato dagli stessi creatori di Metroid™. Pit, il protagonista, è un valoroso angelo guerriero in missione per salvare la dea Palutena e la Terra degli angeli dalla perfida Medusa. Armato di arco e frecce, Pit dovrà combattere dagli Inferi al Mondo celestiale e scovare i Tre Sacri Tesori, fondamentali per sconfiggere la temibile Medusa. Non perderti il grande ritorno di Pit in Kid Icarus™: Uprising per Nintendo 3DS!

NL.name: 3D Classics Kid Icarus™
NL.description: Ervaar klassieke spellen in een nieuwe dimensie met de 3D Classics-serie, laat je onderdompelen in de gloednieuwe 3D-visuals! Kid Icarus™ is een actie-platformspel van de makers van Metroid™, met in de hoofdrol de engelachtige krijger Pit, die de godin Palutena moet bevrijden en Angel Land moet redden uit de greep van de kwaadaardige Medusa. Gewapend met zijn vertrouwde pijl en boog moet Pit zich al strijdend een weg banen vanaf de duistere Underworld tot hoog in de lucht en de drie heilige schatten opsporen. Alleen zo kan Pit krachtig genoeg worden om Medusa te verslaan. Kijk uit naar de terugkeer van Pit in Kid Icarus™: Uprising op Nintendo 3DS!

NZ.name: 3D Classics Kid Icarus™
NZ.description: Enjoy classic games in a new dimension with the 3D Classics range, remastered with immersive 3D visuals! Kid Icarus™ is an action-platformer from the creators of Metroid™; starring angelic warrior Pit, who must rescue the goddess Palutena and save Angel Land from the evil Medusa. Armed with his trusty bow and arrow, Pit must battle from the underworld to the sky, to seek out the Three Sacred Treasures. Only then will Pit have the power to take on Medusa. Armed with his trusty bow and arrow, Pit must battle from the underworld to the sky, to seek out the Three Sacred Treasures. Only then will Pit have the power to take on Medusa. PT.name: 3D Classics Kid Icarus™
PT.description: Com a coleção 3D Classics, os teus jogos clássicos favoritos ganham uma nova dimensão com gráficos impressionantes em 3D! Kid Icarus™ é um jogo de ação-plataformas dos mesmos criadores de Metroid™. O protagonista é o guerreiro angélico Pit que tem como missão resgatar a deusa Palutena e salvar Angel Land da maléfica Medusa. Armado com o seu arco e flecha de confiança, Pit terá de lutar desde o submundo até ao céu, de modo a encontrar os Três Tesouros Sagrados. Só então Pit terá o poder necessário para enfrentar Medusa. Fica atento ao regresso de Pit em Kid Icarus™: Uprising para a Nintendo 3DS!

RU.name: 3D Classics Kid Icarus™
RU.description: Полюбившиеся всем игры приобретают новое звучание благодаря реалистичной трехмерной графике в серии 3D Classics! Kid Icarus™ — игра от создателей Metroid™, сочетающая в себе элементы экшна и платформера. Главный герой — воин Pit — должен спасти богиню Palutena и защитить страну Angel Land от посягательств злой Medusa. Вооружившись луком и стрелами, Pit будет вести беспощадную битву с противником от преисподней до небес. Medusa будет повержена только в том случае, если главному герою удастся отыскать три священных сокровища. Pit возвращается и готов встретить врага во всеоружии в новой игре Kid Icarus™: Uprising для Nintendo 3DS!

SE.name: 3D Classics Kid Icarus™
SE.description: Enjoy classic games in a new dimension with the 3D Classics range, remastered with immersive 3D visuals! Kid Icarus™ is an action-platformer from the creators of Metroid™; starring angelic warrior Pit, who must rescue the goddess Palutena and save Angel Land from the evil Medusa.
